text: Yang Yan (born 2 July 1998) is a Chinese wheelchair basketball player. She is a member of the China women's national wheelchair basketball team and the team. She plays at the centre position. She won the silver medal at the 2020 Summer Paralympics. At the 2018 World Wheelchair Basketball Championship in Hamburg she finished fourth. == References == Category:1998 births Category:Chinese wheelchair basketball players Category:Living people Category:Paralympic silver medalists for China
title: Yang Yan
